roleset.name: protect, minimize the loss

role.descr: entity seeking to minimize a loss

example.name: hedge-v: transitive
example.text: If the weather allowed farmers to work in their fields over the weekend , many Midwest grain elevators will probably sell futures contracts today at the Chicago Board of Trade in order to hedge their weekend purchases from farmers .

example.name: hedge-v: with Arg2
example.text: A number of commercial grain users buttressed that opinion yesterday by buying certain corn options for delivery in March , indicating to analysts that the commercial companies would use the options to hedge against expected corn sales in next year 's first quarter .

example.name: hedge-v: intransitive
example.text: `` That 's the problem with trying to hedge too much , '' said Mr. Brouwer .

example.name: hedge-v: with instrument as subject
example.text: Some analysts suggest , however , that the ratio has weakened in value as an indicator because options and other products can be used to hedge short positions .
